title: Starters & Small Plates
subtitle: Begin Your Culinary Journey
description: Kick off your meal with our delightful selection of appetizers. From fresh salads to savory bites, each dish is crafted to tantalize your taste buds and set the stage for the courses to come.

dishes.title: Greek Salad
dishes.description: A fresh mix of cucumbers, tomatoes, olives, and feta cheese, drizzled with olive oil and herbs.

dishes.title: Bruschetta
dishes.description: Toasted bread topped with a mixture of diced tomatoes, basil, garlic, and olive oil.

dishes.title: Falafel
dishes.description: Crispy chickpea balls served with a side of tahini sauce and fresh vegetables.

dishes.title: Hummus
dishes.description: Creamy chickpea dip served with warm pita bread.

dishes.title: Stuffed Grape Leaves
dishes.description: Grape leaves stuffed with a savory mix of rice, herbs, and spices.

dishes.title: Caprese Salad
dishes.description: Sliced tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil drizzled with balsamic glaze.

title: Entrees & Main Dishes
subtitle: The Heart of Our Menu
description: Discover a diverse array of main courses that showcase the best of Mediterranean cuisine. Our entrees feature a harmonious blend of traditional flavors and modern culinary techniques, offering something for every palate.

dishes.title: Grilled Lamb Chops
dishes.description: Succulent lamb chops grilled to perfection, served with rosemary potatoes and seasonal vegetables.

dishes.title: Chicken Souvlaki
dishes.description: Tender chicken skewers marinated in Mediterranean spices, served with rice and tzatziki sauce.

dishes.title: Moussaka
dishes.description: Layers of eggplant, ground beef, and b√©chamel sauce baked to golden perfection.

dishes.title: Seafood Paella
dishes.description: A flavorful mix of saffron rice, shrimp, mussels, and calamari.

dishes.title: Vegetarian Platter
dishes.description: A variety of grilled vegetables, falafel, hummus, and tabbouleh.

dishes.title: Beef Shawarma
dishes.description: Thinly sliced beef served with pita bread, tahini sauce, and pickled vegetables.

title: Desserts & Sweet Treats
subtitle: Indulge in Sweet Delights
description: End your meal on a high note with our delectable desserts. From classic favorites to innovative creations, our desserts are the perfect way to satisfy your sweet tooth and complete your dining experience.

dishes.title: Baklava
dishes.description: Layers of filo pastry filled with chopped nuts and honey syrup.

dishes.title: Tiramisu
dishes.description: Classic Italian dessert with layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cheese.

dishes.title: Panna Cotta
dishes.description: Creamy Italian dessert topped with a fresh berry compote.

dishes.title: Lemon Sorbet
dishes.description: Refreshing lemon sorbet with a hint of mint.

dishes.title: Chocolate Mousse
dishes.description: Rich chocolate mousse with a touch of orange zest.

dishes.title: Cannoli
dishes.description: Crispy pastry shells filled with sweet ricotta cheese and chocolate chips.

title: Beverages & Refreshments
subtitle: Quench Your Thirst
description: Complement your meal with our selection of beverages. From refreshing non-alcoholic drinks to carefully curated wines and cocktails, we have the perfect drink to enhance your dining experience.

dishes.title: Iced Tea
dishes.description: Refreshing iced tea with a hint of lemon.

dishes.title: Lemonade
dishes.description: Freshly squeezed lemonade with a touch of mint.

dishes.title: Greek Coffee
dishes.description: Traditional Greek coffee with a rich, bold flavor.

dishes.title: Red Wine
dishes.description: A glass of our house red wine.

dishes.title: White Wine
dishes.description: A glass of our house white wine.

dishes.title: Mediterranean Cocktail
dishes.description: A refreshing cocktail inspired by Mediterranean flavors.
